name: Vs. Imposter Alternated
summary: Vs. Imposter Alternated is a mod for Friday Night Funkin' that is based on Among Us. The game is a fanmade variant of the Vs. Impostor mod. Each week is set in an alternate universe. Week 1 is based off if the cut character Blue was in the mod, and Week 2 is based on the Horse Wrangling mode from Among Us.
